_header: For that apple that Eve took
_description: Eve’s fall and Mary’s redemption — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notes interlineated with Latin prose lines which they translate

NLS18721.Transcription:
Pro vetito pomo corruit omnis homoffor þat appel þat
                    Eve tokAl mankindde crist forsokVirginis et merito iam regnabit
                        homo& þoru maries rithfulnesseNu we ben alle siker of
                    blisse
